attributes.action: Create a contingency plan in the event of heavy snow fall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everybody knew snow was coming long before it fell.  What has followed has been a joke. 5 days of road closures, train disruptions, air disruption. Schools closed, businesses closed and university's closed.

Surely it is obvious by now that the preparations were woefully inadequate. This is a petition to create a realistic strategy to deal with such events. A strategy that will keep roads, rail track and runways clear of snow.

What has been the cost to the economy for all of this? Surely a bit of planning and proper implementation would have been worth the investment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
